title: Contract Review Quickstart
description: A practical workflow for reviewing vendor contracts quickly without missing the usual red flags.
checklist: Confirm parties, term, renewal, and governing law
Extract payment terms, termination, and assignment
Flag indemnity, limitation of liability, and warranty scope
Check security, privacy, and data-processing obligations
List fallback positions and propose redlines
risk_notes: Do not paste privileged or confidential content into third-party tools without approval.
Treat AI output as a draft; verify clauses against the source document.

seo.title: Contract Review Playbook
seo.description: A contract review workflow with recommended tools, prompts, and a checklist.
